contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 2, 1902 D Deepdale Contest
Deepdale Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
deepdale-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Deepdale Stadium, Preston, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £40, 2nd £25, 3rd £15, 4th £12, 5th £8. Choice of pieces: "Rose of Castile", "Tannhauser", "Cinq Mars" or Maritana. The latter being chosen by 7 of the 9 bands, and Tannhauser by the other 2. Preston Guild Contest. 9 bands competed.
Aug. 20, 2013, 8:14 p.m. July 11, 2018, 1:54 p.m.
1 Black Dyke Band John Gladney Jnr Tannhäuser [unknown arranger]
2 Wyke Edwin Swift Tannhäuser [unknown arranger]
3 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen Maritana [arr. Round]
4 Wingates Band A. Gray Maritana [arr. Round]
5 Irwell Springs Alexander Owen Maritana [arr. Round]
6 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band John Gladney Jnr Maritana [arr. Round]
7 Coppull Subscription Band William Halliwell Maritana [arr. Round]
8 Atherton Public Prize Band Christopher Smith Maritana [arr. Round]
9 Standish Subscription John Rutter Maritana [arr. Round]
